purpose_text.para: Accesses bits [63:32] of ERR<n>MISC2 for the error record <n> selected by ERRSELR.SEL.

field_description.para: ERXMISC5 accesses bits [63:32] of ERR<n>MISC2, where <n> is the value in ERRSELR.SEL.

access_permission_text.para: If ERRIDR.NUM == 0x0000 or ERRSELR.SEL is set to a value greater than or equal to ERRIDR.NUM, then one of the following occurs:

listitem.content: An UNKNOWN error record is selected.
Direct reads and writes of ERXMISC5 are NOPs.
Direct reads and writes of ERXMISC5 are UNDEFINED.

access_permission_text.para: ERR<n>MISC2 describes additional constraints that also apply when ERR<n>MISC2 is accessed through ERXMISC5.

ps.name: MRC
MCR
